thread.title: Art.com Launches 'Frame Your Art' Online Framing Service
thread.title_full: Art.com Launches 'Frame Your Art' Online Framing Service - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Art.com Launches 'Frame Your Art' Online Framing Service
text:
Art.com
New Offering by Leading Online Wall Art & Decor E-tailer Enables Customers to Frame Art and Personal Photos Without Leaving Home
EMERYVILLE, Calif. , Oct. 13, The high cost associated with lugging personal artwork and photos to a brick-and-mortar frame shop, and waiting weeks for custom framing, is now a thing of the past thanks to the new "Frame Your Art" service from Art.com , the world's leading online destination for discovering and purchasing art. The Frame Your Art offering enables anyone to frame their most treasured photos or artwork with just the tap of a smartphone or click of a mouse. Leveraging Art.com's years of experience in framing and helpful online customization tools, this new by-mail framing solution provides high-quality framing at affordable prices that are easier to navigate than custom frame-shop Quote: s.
"Art.com is rooted in nearly two decades of experience in wall decor and custom framing, and we've developed Frame Your Art as a way to help make art lovers' lives easier," said Geoffroy Martin , Art.com CEO. "With the launch of Frame Your Art, framing your most treasured art or photos is as easy as mailing a letter. We're catering to individuals who appreciate the ease of online shopping and special services that offer added convenience."
How It Works
Frame Your Art users can get custom-framed artwork in just three simple steps:
Choose a frame and customize -First, browse a wide array of frame styles and mats, and use the online visualization tool to find a look you love for your art or photo. Send Art.com your art or photos -Upon placing your order, Art.com will send you prepaid packaging to easily ship your art from home. Enjoy your ready-to-hang piece -Once Art.com receives your art or photo, framing experts will get to work. It will take 3-5 business days to complete your piece and ship it back to most U.S. locations. The Frame Your Art service is quick, affordable, and backed by a dedicated customer support team. Prices range from $59-189 , depending on frame style and size. For additional information (including pricing details) or to get started with Frame Your Art, visit www.art.com/frameyourart .
About Art.com
Art.com is the world's leading online destination for experiencing and buying high-quality wall art. Offering the largest selection of handpicked art images, as well as custom framing, specialty printing, and interactive visualization tools, Art.com helps everyone explore, experiment with and express themselves through artwork-and have fun doing it. Art.com is forever leading the way art is experienced and consumed-through service, technology and craftsmanship-to help people find art they love so they can love their spaces more. A division of Art.com Inc., Art.com is based in Emeryville, Calif.
